title: The problem isn't singed support...
body:
It's that support just isn't a fun role at the moment. Being walking sightstone is tedious and simply not that fun.
However, active items like {{item:3107}}  and  {{item:3401}}  do help. 
IMO wards should be even more available and not forced upon one role

replies.body: I find support to be just as enjoyable as all the other roles.
I'm a support main (ignore recent match history), so I do too. I just wish I'd stop being yelled at to rush sight stone

I mean...some people like playing healers and tanks.

But yeah...it should be more fun.
